00026 // lbann_timer .hpp - Wrapper around time functionality
00028 
00029 #ifndef LBANN_UTILS_TIMER_HPP_INCLUDED
00030 #define LBANN_UTILS_TIMER_HPP_INCLUDED
00031 
00032 #include <chrono>
00033 
00034 namespace lbann {
00035 
00037 inline double get_time() {
00038   using namespace std::chrono;
00039   return duration_cast<duration<double>>(
00040     steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch()).count();
00041 }
00042 
00043 }  // namespace lbann
00044 
00045 #endif  // LBANN_UTILS_TIMER_HPP_INCLUDED
